head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KOENIG, HARRY L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KOENIG, HARRY L.

block.p: KOENIG-Harry L. Esq. Of Lakewood, New Jersey, formerly of New York City, after a long and satisfying legal career died on May 3, 2000. Beloved husband of Edith (nee: Gutman); loving father of Bill, Ben, and Jake; stepfather of Susan Hassman. Devoted brother of Betty Carbone, Rose Rau, Dorothy Shilman and Frieda Faust. Also survived by eleven grandchildren and two greatgrandchildren. Service will be 1 PM Friday at Bloomfield Cooper Jewish Chapels, Route 70 and Vermont Avenue, Lakewood, NJ.
